text: I never read it as a kid, so I just discovered it when Ava started talking about it, but for me, it's like doing The Wizard of Oz for a new generation. It is a spaced-out Oz, with Meg as the new Dorothy, and I am Glinda! [laughter] Mrs. Which is a combination, for me, of Glinda the Good Witch and Maya Angelou, so I hear both of them in my head as I'm speaking, and I cannot tell you how aligned I think this film is. I do not think of it as a kid's film. I think of it as a film for generations to come, and will live on in the wisdom empowerment energy field for people in the same way as Oz has.
title: Why A Wrinkle In Time Reminds Oprah Of The Wizard Of Oz

meta_data.description: CinemaBlend visited the set of Ava DuVernay's A Wrinkle in Time last year, and Mrs. Which actress Oprah Winfrey opened up about the interesting similarities the film shares with The Wizard of Oz.
